# Angular Platform Mobile - LLMs.txt
# Information for AI assistants and language models

## Project Overview

Angular Platform Mobile is a React Native-like framework for building native iOS and Android applications using Angular.

Key features:
- Native performance (not WebView-based)
- Cross-platform code sharing
- Familiar Angular patterns
- TypeScript-first development
- Hot reload support

## Installation

```bash
npm install @pegasusheavy/angular-platform-mobile
# or
pnpm add @pegasusheavy/angular-platform-mobile
```

## Quick Start

```bash
npx ng-mobile init my-app --platform both
cd my-app
npx ng-mobile run android
```

## Core Concepts

### Components
All components use the `mobile-` prefix:
- `<mobile-view>` - Container (UIView / ViewGroup)
- `<mobile-text>` - Text display (UILabel / TextView)
- `<mobile-image>` - Image (UIImageView / ImageView)
- `<mobile-button>` - Button
- `<mobile-text-input>` - Text input
- `<mobile-scroll-view>` - Scrollable container
- `<mobile-flat-list>` - Virtualized list

### Styling
Uses React Native-style syntax:

```typescript
const styles = {
  container: {
    flex: 1,
    justifyContent: 'center',
    alignItems: 'center',
    backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
  }
};
```

### Services
- NavigationService - Screen navigation
- StorageService - Async key-value storage
- DeviceService - Device information
- PermissionsService - Runtime permissions
- AlertService - Native alerts

## CLI Commands

- `ng-mobile init` - Create new project
- `ng-mobile run android|ios` - Run on device
- `ng-mobile build android|ios` - Build for production
- `ng-mobile start` - Start dev server

## Requirements

- Node.js 18+
- Angular 18+
- Xcode (iOS) or Android Studio (Android)
